scripts.dev:backend: pwsh -Command "cd apps/backend; Start-Process pwsh -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'npm run dev'"
scripts.dev:all: npm run dev:backend && npm run dev:frontend
scripts.db:test:up: cd infra && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d
scripts.db:test:down: cd infra && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml down -v
scripts.db:test:migrate: pwsh -Command "docker exec -i st44-db-test psql -U postgres -d st44_test < docker/postgres/init.sql"
